name: Populometer.github.io
body:
Hi!

Welcome to the populometer website.
Populometer is a amazing app allowing you to find places you want to go based on live reviews!

## Why using populometer?
How often did you go to a place, thinking that you would find a certain kind of ambiance or a certain kind of people, and left disapointed because there was this special event, or just because it was a bad day for the bar you wanted to go?
How often, after a hard day, did you want to go to a small place in order to relax with friends, and you were tricked because of a fancy band playing here and waste your night?

This is because we believe that your nights out should always match your expectencies that we have created populometer. Sign up using foursquare and start being having always great nights.

## How does it work?
Shmelano
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
